Drag-and-Drop Examples

Note. The following examples requires the end-user's browser to support HTML5 technology. It means that it works in modern browsers only: IE10+, Safari 6+, Firefox 4+, Google Chrome, and Opera 12+.

1. Drag and drop, without automatic upload

Ajax Uploader allows users to upload files by simply dragging and dropping them over the control - without uploading files to server automatically.

2. Drag and drop, automatic upload

Drag a file into the drop zone, and it'll be uploaded to the server instantly.
